name: Monster Mama
description:
Some evil humans kidnapped four baby monsters and locked them away in a maze-like science facility. Help monster mama find and rescue them without getting seen.

Controls:

  • WASD/arrows to move
  • Left mouse button to break a container/attack unsuspecting guards

This is just a quick prototype for Monster Jam, made because I rewatched aliens the other day and I thought we need more games where you conrol a monster hunting humans.
